about_the_game:
"If only" is a horror, puzzle-solving, and story-exploration game from Vietnam. You will play as a high school student seeking answers to the questions that have always haunted his mind:

  • Why did his mother die?

  • Why does he often experience strange occurrences?

  • Why did his father neglect the family?

Gameplay:

  • Puzzle Solving: Search for clues, collect items, and solve puzzles to unlock the truth.

  • Exploration: Investigate every corner of the house, where many secrets are hidden.

  • Interaction: Your decisions can lead to different endings.

Features:

  • Engaging Storyline: Uncover the hidden tragedies of the protagonist’s family.

  • Eerie Atmosphere: The game contains some scary visuals, tense sounds, and unexpected situations.

  • Rich Vietnamese Culture: From the setting to household items, everything reflects the unique characteristics of Vietnam. Through this game, you will gain more insight into Vietnamese culture.
